profile.name: Pemika Chongkwanyuen
profile.title: Computer Engineering Student
profile.about: I am a Computer Engineering student at KMUTT (Honors Program) with a strong passion for Data Science, AI, and Software Development. I have experience in full-stack development, chatbot creation, and hardware integration. I am an active learner seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world projects.

education.institution: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)

education.degree: High School - Enrichment Science Classroom Program

academic_awards.title: National Finalist ASEAN Data Science Explorers

experience.description: Participated in the Data Analyst bootcamp and competition organized by Khon Kaen University.
Passed to Level 2. Trained in Image Processing, NLP, Big Data Analytics, and IoT.
Developed a chatbot for Prince of Songkla University's Law Faculty to handle student requests and FAQs.

projects.title: Hotel Service Line & Facebook Chatbot
projects.description: AI chatbot for 'The Rich Hotel Rama V' to automate customer service, handling inquiries about room rates and facilities 24/7.

projects.title: FPGA-Tetris
projects.description: A Tetris game implementation on hardware using Verilog HDL, featuring VGA display output and real-time score tracking.

projects.title: Domacod
projects.description: An image categorization and search application using Object Detection and OCR. 1st Runner-up at NSC 2022.

projects.title: Smart Elderly Care Service
projects.description: Designed a 'Caregiver Hub' solution based on data analysis of the aging society in ASEAN. National Finalist in ASEAN DSE 2022.

projects.title: Sweeper Robot
projects.description: Automatic floor cleaning and waste separation robot prototype created for the Future Perfect 2022 MIDI Hackathon.
